content.rendered:
Dedicated to Your Career

If you have recently graduated from a construction management degree program, engineering or similar field of study, we invite you to consider a career with Alticor Inc. As one of the largest general contractors in the US, we have office locations located throughout the nation, all with the same opportunities for career advancement, mentorship, competitive benefits and a company culture second to none. We support the continued growth of our employees through exceptional training, and provide a flexible career path that lets new grads explore field, office, safety, estimating, virtual design and construction (VDC) and a variety of other rewarding positions.

We invite you to explore our up-to-date career opportunities and job postings, to find out how to join our Alticor Inc team. We look forward to welcoming you to the Alticor Inc family! Apply Today!

Find Your Career

Experience the Alticor Inc Culture

Everyone knows we’re a top builder, but what truly sets Alticor Inc apart is our company culture. Below is just one of the many examples of what you can expect to experience in your first year with Alticor Inc. For more “a-day-in-the-life” at Alticor Inc, visit our videos page.
